about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Vinsys IT Services India Limited is engaged in offering services in IT skill development, tranings, and certification domain. The company is a part of Vinsys Group.

As of now, the group comprises 8 entities operating in India, as well as having a marked global footprint in the USA and Middle Eastern Countries.

Vinsys IT Services India Limited offers:

  • Training and Certification
  • IT Development Services
  • Digital Learning
  • Project Management
  • Technology training

Vinsys IT is an ISO 9001:2015 certified organization and is dedicated as an accredited training service provider to meet the growing demand for training and workforce development.

The company specializes in corporate training and consulting across a broad range of domains. They are a trusted partner for entities like Skillsoft, CompTIA, Oracle, PECB, EC-Council, AWS, Microsoft, ;Hybris Software, Red Hat, CISCO, IBM, Autodesk, PMI, PRINCE2, ISACA, ITIL, PeopleCert, and Citrix.

faqs.question: What is the Vinsys IT Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Vinsys IT Services IPO is a SME IPO of 3894000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹49.84 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹128 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on August 1, 2023, and closes on August 4, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Vinsys IT Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Vinsys IT Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Vinsys IT Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Vinsys IT Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Vinsys IT Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Vinsys IT Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Vinsys IT Services IPO opens on August 1, 2023 and closes on August 4, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Vinsys IT Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Vinsys IT Services IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,28,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Vinsys IT Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Vinsys IT Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Vinsys IT Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Vinsys IT Services IPO will be done on Wednesday, August 9, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, August 11, 2023. Check the Vinsys IT Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Vinsys IT Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Vinsys IT Services IPO listing date is on Friday, August 11, 2023.
